Docs.summary: Options used to configure hub instances.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the time window clients have to send a message before the server closes the connection. The default timeout is 30 seconds.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether detailed error messages are sent to the client. Detailed error messages include details from exceptions thrown on the server.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the interval used by the server to timeout incoming handshake requests by clients. The default timeout is 15 seconds.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the interval used by the server to send keep alive pings to connected clients. The default interval is 15 seconds.

Docs.summary: By default a client is only allowed to invoke a single Hub method at a time. Changing this property will allow clients to invoke multiple methods at the same time before queueing.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the maximum message size of a single incoming hub message. The default is 32KB.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the max buffer size for client upload streams. The default size is 10.
